content: --अरण्यं, --वनं {1} <ab>N.</ab> of a forest near Gokula; वृंदारण्ये वसतिरधुना केवलं दुःखहेतुः <ls>Pad. D. 38</ls>, <ls n="Pad. D.">41</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 50.</ls> {2} a raised mound of earth to plant and preserve the holy basil.
वृंदावन ‘Rādhā's wood’ now forming an important town a few miles north-west of Mathurā, and standing on the left bank of the Yamunā.
